original_text: That is what happened. When Gideon got up the next morning, the wool was wet. Gideon squeezed water out of it. It was enough to fill a bowl!
korean_text: 그대로 된지라 이튿날 기드온이 일찍이 일어나서 양털을 가져다가 그 양털에서 이슬을 짜니 물이 그릇에 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: When Gideon got up the next morning,
sentences.korean_translation: 기드온이 다음 날 아침에 일어났을 때,

sentences.original_text: Gideon squeezed water out of it.
It was enough to fill a bowl!
